name: RewScape
description:
This is a game made for the 4th Brackeys Game Jam.

The 'music' is mine.

The font is from here:
https://www.fontspace.com/a-atmospheric-font-f46808

And the 'art' is mine too.

Editor controlls:

awsd - move
r-rotate
e-edit menu
Click to select and click again to move the objects.
